instruction: Give an example of a good interview answer and explain why it is good.
output: A good interview answer is one that is honest, relevant to the job and conveys enthusiasm for the position. For example, an answer to a question about previous roles might be, "As a Retail Manager, I was responsible for overseeing the operations of the store and ensuring the safety of staff and customers. I really enjoyed the challenge of my last position and am looking to grow my career in a similar role in the company." This answer is honest, relevant and shows enthusiasm for the role.
